name: 1D Flappy bird
description:
This game was made for the GMTK Game Jam 2019.

This game is based on flappy bird, only now in only one dimension. also the game will move on screen to make it even more difficult. Good Luck and have fun.

Controlls: spacebar or left mouse button

Game Made by: MrMoevie and JsaurusRex. 

Music:
Transient by Ghostrifter Official - https://soundcloud.com/ghostrifter-official
